ext_description.message: A-B repeat and multi-section loops for YouTube. Practice faster with keyboard shortcuts.

critical_error_title.message: Section Repeat: Critical error. Please try reinstalling.

popup_note_inactive.message: Hotkeys are active when you are on a YouTube video page.

popup_warning_session_only_mode_detailed.message: Session-only mode is active because a security component failed. Sections will not be saved. Restarting your browser may resolve this.

popup_storage_warning_message.message: Storage is over $1% full. Older data may be deleted soon.

popup_storage_purge_completed.message: Older data has been successfully purged.

popup_storage_purge_failed.message: Purge failed. Please try again later.

popup_error_setup_advice.message: Please try again. If the problem persists, try reloading the page.

popup_error_setup_crypto_failed.message: A required browser security component failed to initialize. Section data cannot be saved. Please try 'Retry Setup'. If the problem persists, restarting your browser may help.

popup_error_setup_unknown.message: An unknown error occurred during setup.

popup_error_connection_failed.message: Couldn't connect to the extension. Please reload the page and try again.

popup_error_connection_timeout.message: Connection timed out. Please reload the page and try again.

toast_success_sections_cleared.message: All sections for this video have been cleared.

toast_info_section_start_set.message: Section start point set. Press 'E' to end.

toast_info_incomplete_section_autocomple.message: Incomplete section was automatically completed at video end.

toast_info_loaded_singular.message: Loaded 1 saved section for this video.

toast_info_loaded_plural.message: Loaded $1 saved sections for this video.

toast_info_legacy_data_cleared.message: Incompatible old data has been cleared to ensure smooth operation.

toast_info_autorepeat_video.message: The video has finished. Repeating from the beginning.

toast_info_sectioning_hint.message: Press 'S' to start a section, 'E' to end it.

toast_info_playlist_hint.message: Tip: Press 'W' to enter Focus Mode and leave the playlist.

toast_info_focus_mode_already.message: You are already in Focus Mode.

toast_info_focus_mode_entering.message: Entering Focus Mode... The page will reload.

toast_warn_initialization_slow.message: Extension is still loading... Please try again in a moment.

toast_warning_live_stream_unsupported.message: Section Repeat is not available for live streams.

toast_warning_repeat_stopped_unexpectedl.message: Repeat was stopped due to a navigation or background error.

toast_warning_storage_level.message: Storage is $1% full. Old data might be purged.

toast_warning_sections_auto_purged.message: Section limit of $1 reached. Removed $2 oldest section(s) to make space.

toast_error_player_init_failed.message: Initialization failed after multiple retries. Please reload the page.

toast_error_storage_critical.message: Storage Critical ($1% full). Old data must be purged to save new sections.

toast_error_focus_mode_failed.message: Could not enter Focus Mode. Please try again.

toast_error_action_locked.message: Action failed because another operation is in progress. Please try again in a moment.

toast_error_final_save_failed.message: Failed to save data. Please use 'Purge Old Data' in the popup to free up space.

toast_reload_prompt.message: The extension context was lost. Please reload the page to continue.

dialog_purge_confirm_message.message: This will permanently delete your oldest section data to make space. Are you sure?

dialog_critical_error_dom_changed.message: The YouTube page structure changed unexpectedly, and the extension lost control. Please reload the page to restart the extension.

dialog_critical_error_guidance_with_rein.message: A critical component failed to load, which prevents the extension from working correctly. This issue may require you to reinstall the extension.

aria_popup_shortcuts_table_label.message: Keyboard shortcuts list. Use arrow keys to navigate rows.

aria_popup_storage_purge_button_label.message: Delete older section data to free up storage space.

aria_overlay_desc_no_sections.message: No sections have been set for this video.

aria_overlay_desc_singular.message: 1 section has been set on the progress bar.

aria_overlay_desc_plural.message: $1 sections have been set on the progress bar.

aria_overlay_desc_with_repeating.message: A total of $1 sections have been set. Currently repeating section number $2.

aria_overlay_desc_with_incomplete.message: A total of $1 sections have been set, $2 of which are incomplete.

aria_overlay_desc_full_state.message: A total of $1 sections have been set, $2 of which are incomplete. Currently repeating section number $3.
